changeSet.sql: UPDATE campaign_client cc SET completed_user = 'crm', assignee = 'crm', completed = cc.created FROM campaign_step cs WHERE cc.step_id = cs.id AND cs.type = 'sms' and cc.completed_user is null and completed is null and assignee is null;

changeSet.sql: update overdue_action set alternate_delay_days = (select overdue_days + 10 from overdue_action where overdue_settings_id = (select id from overdue_process_settings ORDER BY valid_from desc limit 1) and reminder_type = 30) where overdue_settings_id = (select id from overdue_process_settings ORDER BY valid_from desc limit 1) and reminder_type = 36 and overdue_days > (select overdue_days + 10 from overdue_action where overdue_settings_id = (select id from overdue_process_settings ORDER BY valid_from desc limit 1) and reminder_type = 30)

changeSet.author: argo
argo

column.name: message
column.value: I nderuar Klient, Pagesa e kestit te kredise [ref_nr] ne IuteCredit eshte ne [payment_date] ne shumen [amount] lek. Ju lutem paguani ne kohe per te evituar penalitet!

column.name: message
column.value: Qe te keni histori te mire kreditore, ju lutemi paguani kredine ne kohe. Shuma [amount] Eur e kredise nr [ref_nr] duhet paguar ne daten [payment_date]. Faleminderit!

column.name: message
column.value: Za da imate dobra kreditna istorija, ve molime vrsete uplati navremeno! Iznos [amount] MKD, kredit br. [ref_nr], najdocna do datum [payment_date]. Vi blagodarime!

column.name: message
column.value: Payment day for your loan nr [ref_nr] is [payment_date]. If you repay on [payment_date], your payment will be [amount] mdl. Please pay in time!

column.name: message
column.value: Ziua de plata pentru imprumutul [ref_nr] este [payment_date]. Daca achitati pe [payment_date], suma spre plata este [amount] mdl. Va rugam sa achitati la timp!

column.name: message
column.value: [payment_date] vash deni oplaty po zaimu [ref_nr]. Pri oplate [payment_date], summa k oplate - [amount] mdl. Prosim vas oplatiti vovremia!

INSERT INTO doc_template (content, created, name, lang, type, template_type) VALUES ('

Potpisuvanjeto na Dogovorot e uspesno! Odobreniot iznos kje bide prefrlen na Vasata transakciska smetka.

', now(), 'Signing success sms', 'mac', 'signing_success_sms', 'sms'); INSERT INTO doc_template (content, created, name, lang, type, template_type) VALUES ('

The signing of the contract was successful. The approved amount will be transferred to your bank account.

', now(), 'Signing success sms', 'eng', 'signing_success_sms', 'sms');

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql:

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql: alter table aftersale_campaign add column duration integer default 1; update act_hi_taskinst set due_date_ = (start_time_ + interval '30 day') where name_ = 'Aftersale task' and due_date_ is null and end_time_ is null;

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql: update campaign_client set loan_app_id = latest_la.id from (select DISTINCT ON (cl.pin) cl.pin as pin, la.id as id from client_profile cl left join loan_application la on cl.id = la.latest_client order by cl.pin, cl.created desc) latest_la where latest_la.pin = client_pin and loan_app_id is null and aftersale_campaign_id is not null and completed is null;

changeSet.author: ivar
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO doc_template (content, created, name, lang, type, template_type) VALUES ('

The signing of the contract was unsuccessful. Insert the new code [code].

', now(), 'Signing unsuccesful sms', 'eng', 'signing_unsuccessful_first_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Potpisuvanjeto na Dogovorot e neuspesno. Vnesete nov kod. [code]

', now(), 'Signing unsuccesful sms', 'mac', 'signing_unsuccessful_first_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

The signing of the contract was unsuccessful. Please contact IUTECREDIT at 02 3149 999.

', now(), 'Signing aborted sms', 'eng', 'signing_unsuccessful_second_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Potpisuvanjeto na Dogovorot e neuspesno. Ve molime javete se vo IuteCredit na 02 3149 999.

', now(), 'Signing aborted sms', 'mac', 'signing_unsuccessful_second_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Format soobshenija nepriznannyi. Dopolnitelnaia informatsia po telefonu 022801500.

', now(), 'Wrong format sms', 'rus', 'wrong_format_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Unrecognized message format. Please call 022801500 for any additional info.

', now(), 'Wrong format sms', 'eng', 'wrong_format_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Formati i mesazhit tuaj nuk eshte i sakte. Ju lutem telefononi 038406080 per me shume informacion

', now(), 'Wrong format sms', 'alb', 'wrong_format_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Formatul mesajului este gresit. Pentru suport apelati 022801500

', now(), 'Wrong format sms', 'rom', 'wrong_format_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Kredia juaj u aprovua. Tani mund te firmosni marreveshjen e kredise nr. [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta accepted sms', 'alb', 'posta_accepted_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Your loan application was approved. You can now sign the loan agreement nr. [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta accepted sms', 'eng', 'posta_accepted_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Cererea Dvs de credit a fost aprobata. Va rugam sa semnati contractul de imprumut nr.[ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta accepted sms', 'rom', 'posta_accepted_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Vash kredit byl odobren. Prosim vas podpisati gogovor zaima nomer [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta accepted sms', 'rus', 'posta_accepted_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Ju tani mund ti terhiqni parate ne zyren postare. Numri i kredise suaj eshte [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta paid out sms', 'alb', 'posta_paid_out_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

You can now pick-up your money at postal offie. Your loan agreement number is [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta paid out sms', 'eng', 'posta_paid_out_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Puteti primi suma imprumutului la oficiul postal. Numarul contractului Dvs este [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta paid out sms', 'rom', 'posta_paid_out_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Vy mojete poluchiti summu kredita v pochtovom otdelenii. Nomer vashego dogovora [ref_nr]

', now(), 'Posta paid out sms', 'rus', 'posta_paid_out_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Your loan application [ref_nr] was approved, loan amount [loan_amount] mdl, loan duration [loan_period] months, monthly payback is [monthly_payment] mdl, you have to make [loan_period] equal repayments from [first_repayment] until [last_repayment], annual interest rate [interest_rate], loan commission fee is [commission_fee] mdl, monthly guarantee fee is [monthly_guarantee_fee] mdl, total loan cost is [total_loan] mdl, APR = [apr_rate]%, you have the right to resign the loan agreement during 14 days from its issuance. To accept the loan terms please send YES to 5588.

', now(), 'Loan approved remote signing guarantee sms', 'eng', 'approve_distance_signing_guarantee_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Your loan application [ref_nr] was approved, loan amount [loan_amount] mdl, loan duration [loan_period] months, monthly payback is [monthly_payment] mdl, you have to make [loan_period] equal repayments from [first_repayment] until [last_repayment], annual interest rate [interest_rate], loan commission fee is [commission_fee] mdl, total loan cost is [total_loan] mdl, APR = [apr_rate]%, you have the right to resign the loan agreement during 14 days from its issuance. To accept the loan terms please send YES to 5588.

', now(), 'Loan approved remote signing sms', 'eng', 'approve_distance_signing_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Vasha zaiavka na zaim nr. [ref_nr] byla odobrena, summa zaima [loan_amount] lei, srok zaima [loan_period] mesiatsev, platej po zaimu [monthly_payment] lei, vy doljny vnesti [loan_period] ravnyh platejei nachinaia s [first_repayment] i zakanchivaia [last_repayment], godovaia stavka [interest_rate], platej za protessirovanie [commission_fee] lei, garantiinyi komission [monthly_guarantee_fee] lei/mesiats, obshaia stoimosti zaima [total_loan] lei, DAE=[apr_rate]%, vy imeete pravo otozvati dogovor zaima v techenii 14 dnei s momenta podpisania dogovora. Dlia priniatia etih uslovii i poluchenia zaima otpravite slovo DA na nomer 5588.

', now(), 'Loan approved remote signing guarantee sms', 'rus', 'approve_distance_signing_guarantee_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Vasha zaiavka na zaim nr. [ref_nr] byla odobrena, summa zaima [loan_amount] lei, srok zaima [loan_period] mesiatsev, platej po zaimu [monthly_payment] lei, vy doljny vnesti [loan_period] ravnyh platejei nachinaia s [first_repayment] i zakanchivaia [last_repayment], godovaia stavka [interest_rate], platej za protessirovanie [commission_fee] lei, obshaia stoimosti zaima [total_loan] lei, SGPS=[apr_rate]%, vy imeete pravo otozvati dogovor zaima v techenii 14 dnei s momenta podpisania dogovora. Dlia priniatia etih uslovii i poluchenia zaima otpravite slovo DA na nomer 5588.

', now(), 'Loan approved remote signing sms', 'rus', 'approve_distance_signing_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Cererea dvs de imprumut nr. [ref_nr] a fost aprobata, suma imprumut [loan_amount] lei, durata imprumutului [loan_period] luni, plata lunara este [monthly_payment] lei, aveti de facut [loan_period] plati egale de la data de [first_repayment] pana la data de [last_repayment], dobanda anuala [interest_rate], taxa aferenta contractului [commission_fee] lei, comision lunar de garantie [monthly_guarantee_fee] lei, costul total al imprumutului este [total_loan] lei, DAE=[apr_rate]%, aveti dreptul sa revocati contractul de imprumut timp de 14 zile din momentul semnarii. Pentru a accepta aceste conditii si a primi imprumutul expediati DA la numarul 5588.

', now(), 'Loan approved remote signing guarantee sms', 'rom', 'approve_distance_signing_guarantee_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Cererea dvs de imprumut nr. [ref_nr] a fost aprobata, suma imprumut [loan_amount] lei, durata imprumutului [loan_period] luni, plata lunara este [monthly_payment] lei, aveti de facut [loan_period] plati egale de la data de [first_repayment] pana la data de [last_repayment], dobanda anuala [interest_rate], taxa aferenta contractului [commission_fee] lei, costul total al imprumutului este [total_loan] lei, DAE=[apr_rate]%, aveti dreptul sa revocati contractul de imprumut timp de 14 zile din momentul semnarii. Pentru a accepta aceste conditii si a primi imprumutul expediati DA la numarul 5588.

', now(), 'Loan approved remote signing sms', 'rom', 'approve_distance_signing_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Vash platej po kreditu byl snijen na [sum] [currency]. Summa k oplate na [expected_date] sostavliaet [installment_total] lei. Podrobnosti po tel: 022801500

', now(), 'Reduced monthly payments sms', 'rus', 'reduced_monthly_payments_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Kesti juaj mujor eshte ulur me [sum] [currency].Ju duhet te paguani [installment_total] deri ne [expected_date]. Telefononi 042239111 per detaje.

', now(), 'Reduced monthly payments sms', 'alb', 'reduced_monthly_payments_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Your monthly repayment was reduced with [sum] [currency]. You should pay [installment_total] until [expected_date]. Call 022801500 for details.

', now(), 'Reduced monthly payments sms', 'eng', 'reduced_monthly_payments_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Rata lunara pentru creditul dvs a fost micsorata cu [sum] [currency]. Suma spre achitare la data [expected_date] este de [installment_total]. Detalii 022801500

', now(), 'Reduced monthly payments sms', 'rom', 'reduced_monthly_payments_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

You got a [sum] [currency] bonus for recommending us [rec_first_name] [rec_last_name]. Call 022801500 for details.

', now(), 'Referral bonus sms', 'eng', 'referral_bonus_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Ati primit un bonus-reducere in marime de [sum] [currency] pentru clientul recomandat [rec_first_name] [rec_last_name]. Detalii 022801500

', now(), 'Referral bonus sms', 'rom', 'referral_bonus_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Vy poluchili bonus-skidku v razmere [sum] [currency] za rekomendovannogo klienta [rec_first_name] [rec_last_name]. Podrobnosti po tel: 022801500

', now(), 'Referral bonus sms', 'rus', 'referral_bonus_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Amount limit for remote signing is 15.000 mdl. Please call 022801500 to modify your loan application.

', now(), 'Sign limit exeeded sms', 'eng', 'sign_limit_exeeded_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Summa zaima po dogovoru [ref_nr] byla perevedena na vashu bankovskuiu kartu. Vy mojete poluchiti denghi v liubom bankomate v Moldove, bez comisiona.

', now(), 'Money transferred to card', 'rus', 'money_transferred_to_card_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Suma imprumutului conform contractului [ref_nr] a fost depusa pe cardul dvs bancar. Puteti ridica banii fara comision la oricare bancomat in Moldova.

', now(), 'Money transferred to card', 'rom', 'money_transferred_to_card_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

SMS signing not allowed

', now(), 'Sign not allowed sms', 'eng', 'sign_not_allowed_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Semnarea prin SMS este interzisa in acest caz

', now(), 'Sign not allowed sms', 'rom', 'sign_not_allowed_sms', 'sms_legacy'), ('

Podpisanie po SMS v dannom sluchaie ne razresheno

', now(), 'Sign not allowed sms', 'rus', 'sign_not_allowed_sms', 'sms_legacy');

changeSet.author: ivar
ivar
ivar
changeSet.sql: insert into doc_template_loan_product (loan_product_id, template_id) select l.id as loan_product_id, dt.id as template_id from loan_products l, doc_template dt where dt.created :: date = now() :: date;

changeSet.author: ivar
changeSet.comment: CRA-672 Add languages, that can be assigned to customers
changeSet.sql: insert into property (country_config_id, type, boolean_value, long_value) values ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'english'), 'boolean', false, null) , ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'albanian'), 'boolean', true, null) , ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'romanian'), 'boolean', false, null) , ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'russian' ), 'boolean', false, null) , ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'macedonian'), 'boolean', false, null) , ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'serbian'), 'boolean', false, null)

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO country_configuration (property_group, property, description) VALUES ('loan_product', 'returnMaxPrincipal30000ForBasicEntryWithBoaHistory', 'Return max principal 30000 for Basic Entry with BoA history'); insert into property(country_config_id, type, boolean_value) values ((select max(id) from country_configuration), 'boolean', false);

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql: update property set boolean_value = true where country_config_id = (select id from country_configuration where property = 'enableUpdateAgriculturalAssests');

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql: update property set boolean_value = false where country_config_id = (select id from country_configuration where property = 'enableUpdateAgriculturalAssests');

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql: update property set boolean_value = false where country_config_id = (select id from country_configuration where property = 'enableIsShowBankStatement');

changeSet.author: oleg
changeSet.sql: update property set boolean_value = true where country_config_id = (select id from country_configuration where property = 'enableIsShowBankStatement');

changeSet.author: risto
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO country_configuration (property_group, property, description) VALUES ('client', 'showCrkHistory', 'Show "CRK history" option on client profile and loan app');

changeSet.author: risto
changeSet.sql: insert into property(country_config_id, type, boolean_value) values ((select id from country_configuration where property = 'showCrkHistory'), 'boolean', false);

changeSet.sql: insert into property(country_config_id, type, boolean_value) values ((select id from country_configuration where property = 'showCrkHistory'), 'boolean', true);

changeSet.author: ivar
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO doc_template (content, created, name, lang, type, template_type) VALUES ('

Money sent to card

', '2019-02-21'::date, 'Money transferred to card sms (This template content was missing)', 'eng', 'money_transferred_to_card_sms', 'sms_legacy'); INSERT INTO country_configuration (property, property_group, description) VALUES ('albanian_kosovo', 'client_language', 'Albanian (Kosovo)'); insert into property (country_config_id, type, boolean_value, long_value) values ((select id from country_configuration where property_group = 'client_language' and property = 'albanian_kosovo'), 'boolean', false, null); insert into doc_template(content, created, name, lang, type, template_type) select content, '2019-02-21'::date, name, 'srp', type, template_type from doc_template where lang = 'eng' and template_type = 'sms_legacy'; insert into doc_template(content, created, name, lang, type, template_type) select content, '2019-02-21'::date, name, 'xkx', type, template_type from doc_template where lang = 'eng' and template_type = 'sms_legacy'; insert into doc_template_loan_product (loan_product_id, template_id) select l.id as loan_product_id, dt.id as template_id from loan_products l, doc_template dt where dt.created :: date = '2019-02-21' :: date;
